1. Integrated TRONZ privacy protocol in Nile Testnet, you can use TronLink to create shielded addresses, manage your balance, make shielded transfers and check transaction records.
2. Supported the switch between Nile Testnet and mainnet.
3. Adjusted the order of bandwidth and energy in resources.
4. Optimized some text in transfers and voting.
5. Fixed bugs to improve stability.
